solution.text:
Given equation: sec_{j}_\(\times\)tan_{k}_
we can write : sec_{j}_ as cosec(90-_{j}_)
similarly
tan_{k}_ as cot(90-_{k}_)
which gives :
cosec_{{90-j}}_\(\times\) cot_{{90-k}}_

content.text: Convert the given expression (sec_{j}_)\(\times\)(tan_{k}_) in terms of trigonometric ratios of angles between 0 and 45.
